about_the_game:
Millennia pass like dreams; seas turn to fields, yet the nightmare lingers.

Returning to the ruins, a glance reveals the terror that remains.

The boundaries between heaven and earth, between self and other, become blurred.

Who are we, and where do we belong in this enigmatic world?

“Paper Bride 6 Nightmare” is the sixth work to the Paper Bride series. Dive into a bewitching dream and immerse yourself in yet another immersive Chinese horror puzzle game!

In this chapter, we will transcend time and trace nightmares back to their origins. How will our protagonists prepare themselves for the ancient horrors that confront them, and unravel this timeless mystery? The Paper Bride series continues to evolve in this new and thrilling work!

[Refined Deep Research]

As always, we delve deep into the intricacies and provenance of Chinese folklore to ensure a professional and authentic experience. Newcomers may not be familiar with this, but we thrive on extensive research—it wouldn’t feel right otherwise.. For fans of our series, we continue to deliver on an immersive experience steeped in traditional culture, without compromise.

[Improved Visuals]

Eerie and otherworldly backdrops, a vibrant outfit system (really?!), and top-tier artwork with stunning visuals.

[Even More Heart-pounding Thrills]

Just a *little* scarier than the previous chapters. Just a little. Still makes for the perfect bedtime story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6550 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440（512M）or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: I3 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX560se or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
